content.title: Type A Aortic Dissection
content.description: Acute aortic syndrome involving the ascending aorta, representing a surgical emergency with high mortality if untreated.

diagnosis.cta: Gold standard, shows intimal flap, true/false lumen, extension

surgical_management.goal: Replace ascending aorta, resect intimal tear, restore true lumen flow
